Lyric:
[by:借问人间]
[ti:I Like It Heavy]
[ar:Halestorm]
[al:Into The Wild Life ]
[00:01.080] 
[00:07.960]Some like beautiful, perfect, and pretty 
[00:11.820]I see the good in the bad and the ugly 
[00:15.790]I need the volume one louder than ten 
[00:19.250]Put the pedal to the metal, needle into the red 
[00:23.180]If the windows ain t shaking 
[00:25.120]Making my heart race 
[00:26.890]If I can t feel it in my chest 
[00:28.830]I m in the wrong damn place 
[00:31.040]Got a demon in my soul 
[00:32.960]And a voice in my head 
[00:34.950]Saying go, go, go 
[00:36.940]I can sleep when I m dead 
[00:38.900]There s a sonic revelation bringing me to my knees 
[00:42.660]And there s a man down below that needs my sympathy 
[00:46.590]I got a ringing in my ears getting ready to burst 
[00:50.630]Screaming hallelujah mother fucker take me to church 
[00:54.430]I like it louder than the boom of a big bass drum 
[00:58.320]I need it harder than the sound of guitar grunge 
[01:02.270]I like to crank it up, make it thump, all needles to the core 
[01:06.870]Head banging in the pit and throwing my horns 
[01:10.070]And just like old school Sabbath, Zeppelin, and Lemmy 
[01:14.120]I need to drop it down low and make it heavy 
[01:17.960]I like it heavy 
[01:19.500] 
[01:20.130]Whoa 
[01:21.900]I like it heavy 
[01:23.900]Whoa 
[01:26.600]I ride the lightning, roll with the thunder 
[01:30.070]Going down, down, down with my sisters and brothers 
[01:34.510]I fell in love with the darkest parts 
[01:38.380]Standing on the side of the wild at heart 
[01:41.590]I plucked a feather off a crow 
[01:43.850]So I could fly 
[01:45.570]Since I was 13 years old 
[01:47.520]I ve had my horns to the sky 
[01:49.480]I like it louder than the boom of a big bass drum 
[01:53.440]I need it harder than the sound of guitar grunge 
[01:57.340]I like to crank it up, make it thump, all needles to the core 
[02:01.900]Head banging in the pit and throwing my horns 
[02:05.210]And just like old school Sabbath, Zeppelin, and Lemmy 
[02:09.120]I need to drop it down low and make it heavy 
[02:13.030]I like it heavy 
[02:15.030]Whoa

[02:18.980]Whoa 
[02:21.900]I like it, I like it, I like it heavy 
[02:25.910]I like it, I like it, I like it heavy
